entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-03
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Microsoft.NET.RuntimeIdentifierInference.targets incorrectly sets RID to win7-x86 / win7-x64 #35575
    9.0.1xx
  • [NETSDKE2E]Duplicate workload version info displays in dotnet --info of NET8 RTM SDK #35920
    8.0.2xx
  • Add flag for --workload-state when installing/update workloads for the old install behavior #34561
  • Solution filter files (.slnf) should be auto detected by `dotnet build` and `dotnet test` like .sln files #37742
  • warning NETSDK1004: Assets file '/root/.nuget/packages/system.threaing.tasks/4.3.0/ref/netstandard1.3/System.Threading.Tasks.xml not found #29659
  • `UseMSBuildTestInfrastructure` doesn't work for multi-tfm #37712
  • Error NU1301: `dotnet tool install` #37714

Updated

  • PackageInstall.Tests timeout known build error #36192
  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • Add "Who built this" to `dotnet --info` #37725
  • `wasm-tools` workload breaks `dotnet publish` in docker #32327
  • Improve workload list to work better with VS and other SDK bands #31283
    8.0.2xx
  • Support for new Workload Set Versions #35455
    8.0.2xx
  • Support workloads installed via Visual Studio from CLI `dotnet workload` commands #21811
    8.0.2xx
  • Workloads distribution and management is understandable and seamless for developers #30008
    .NET 8.0
  • Improve workload repair to actually fix a customers installation and manifests #31282
    9.0.1xx
  • NuGet Package can't find "latest" version #36637
  • Containers: extend environment variables for passing registry credentials #37606
  • AOT compile gives incorrect error about Roslyn source generator coming from a ProjectReference #37228
  • Workload installation failed: microsoft.android.sdk.windows::34.0.64 is not found in NuGet feeds https://api.nuget.org/v3/index.json" #37580
  • `dotnet` should report .NET not MSBuild version #37713

PullRequests

Created

  • Add comment #37753
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37751
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #37750
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Provide new default for runtime identifier Fixes #35575 #36848
    Area-External, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #37251
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37715
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] [Blazor] Replace `webapp,razor` with `blazor` on `dotnet new` #37299
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.419 #37720
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable TerminalLogger by default for .NET 9 SDKs #37492
    untriaged, breaking-change, Area-CLI, 9.0.1xx
  • Update branding to 6.0.322 #37719
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.127 #37718
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding and update the helix queue to osx 1200 #37726
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.313 #37722
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.102 #37724
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.406 #37723
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.116 #37721
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add `--arch` and `--os` options to commands that already support `--runtime` option #37429
    untriaged, Area-CLI
